DOC.brief_summary: This study initiate investigate effect nutritional product 3-hr postprandial glucose response compare control standard breakfast baseline 4 week intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Meal Tolerance Trial Pregnant Women Diagnosed With Gestational Diabetes Mellitus .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Pregnant woman , age 1840 year 2 . 18.5 kg/m2 < prepregnancy BMI < 27.5 kg/m2 [ represent low moderate risk category , adapt WHO expert panel recommendation BMI category determine public health clinical action ( REF : Lancet , 2004 ) ] 3 . Singleton pregnancy 4 . Newly GDM diagnose woman 24 ( late ) 32 week gestation ; 5 . Diagnosed GDM accord either : World Health Organization ( WHO ) criteria one glucose value equal exceed threshold value [ 75g Oral Glucose Tolerance Test : fasting 126 mg/dl ; 2h 140 mg/dl ] American Diabetic Association ( ADA ) criteria two glucose value equal exceed threshold value [ 100g Oral Glucose Tolerance Test : fasting 95 mg/dl ; 1h 180 mg/dl ; 2h 155 mg/dl , 3h 140/dl ] 6 . Willing able comply protocol 7 . Signed informed consent 1 . Any gastrointestinal disease interfere bowel function nutritional intake ( i.e . constipation diarrhea secondary neuropathy , diarrhea due chronic inflammatory bowel disease , gastroparesis , gastrectomy , galactosaemia , hyperemesis ) 2 . Currently antidiabetic therapy , example insulin oral antidiabetic medication 3 . Already use diabetes nutritional/dietary supplement ( e.g . Glucerna® , Nutrient Diabetes® ) within 4 week prior sign inform consent 4 . Known allergy intolerance follow ingredient ; fish , milk , protein , lactose , fiber soy 5 . Any significant medical condition , GDM , might interfere study know affect intrauterine growth ( e.g . Type 1 Diabetes , Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus , Crohn 's disease , HIV/AIDS , liver disease , kidney disease etc . ) 6 . Currently previously special low/no carbohydrate diet ( e.g . Atkin 's diet ) within 8 week prior sign inform consent 7 . Incapability comply study protocol Investigator 's uncertainty willingness ability subject comply protocol requirement 8 . Participation study involve investigational market product concomitantly within 4 week prior sign inform consent
